item.title: How to learn Touchtyping
item.description: What is Touchtyping?Touchtyping is a method of typing which requires you to use all 10 fingers and makes typing on a keyboard more than just finding & pressing buttons. It makes you blazing fast & efficient. Touchtyping is a great skill, it can literally save you a lot of time looking for different keys when you need it. But it can be a little intimidating and frustrating to start learning a new way of typing just like anyting new.

item.title: How to Install Apps Using Terminal in Ubuntu 22.10
item.description: Using terminal is the easiest way to install apps in linux Installing appsTo install apps use the following command: $ sudo apt install packageName Replace packageName with the name of the package Uninstalling appsUsing removeTo uninstall apps use the following command: $ sudo apt remove packageNamudo/ Replace packageName with the name of the package or Using purge$ sudo apt purge packageName Replace packageName with the name of the package Difference between remove & purgeThe primary difference being ‘remove‘ and ‘purge‘ is that ‘remove‘ only gets rid of the package leaving any configuration files untouched.

item.title: How to Add an Alias in Macos Terminal
item.description: Zsh is the default MacOS Shell. So to add an alias, we need to make changes to the zsh config file that is .zshrc. Open .zshrc.zshrc is typically present in the home folder ~/.zshrc Adding aliasAdd the alias to the .zshrc in the following syntax alias aliasName="command" Source .zshrcAfter saving, source .zshrc using the following command in the Terminal $ source ~/.zshrc

item.title: Why Vim Is Just Better
item.description: What is Vim?According to the Vim’s official website, Vim is a highly configurable text editor built to make creating and changing any kind of text very efficient. It is included as “vi” with most UNIX systems and with Apple OS X. Also it is free & opensource. Vim features Its memory footprint is very low and is a terminal app. It is command centric. You can perform complex text related task with few commands.

item.title: How to add social media preview (WhatsApp card) to your website
item.description: You might have come across some websites that when shared on social media platforms like Twitter & WhatsApp shows a preview card of the website which typically includes an image and a short description of the page. This is accomplished with the use of OpenGraph protocol. This is used to add meta data to your websites. How to add social media previewThis is done by adding OpenGraph meta tags to the <head> tag of the HTML file.
